product_name: Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case - iPad Mini Retina
long_description: The sleek Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case for iPad(R) Mini Retina offers all-around protection from bumps, drops, and spills with a full-perimeter outer shell and soft, anti-scratch lining. Vegan leatherlike cover balances sturdy construction with vivid colors and patterns while being smooth to the touch and easy to clean. Multiple resting angles allow comfortable viewing and typing. Locking clasp on the Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case secures your iPad mini easily in both frontal and rear closure positions.
short_description: The sleek Speck Stylefolio Tablet Case for iPad(R) Mini Retina offers all-around protection from bumps, drops, and spills with a full-perimeter outer shell and soft, anti-scratch lining.
